Message.Subject: MLHG PO MLHG-PO-104772 — Please process invoice (attached PDF) for seating delivery (Phase 2)

Body.Content:
Hi Accounts Payable team,

Please help us process the attached vendor invoice package for our Phase 2 seating refresh. This invoice should be matched against our PO and distributed across the receiving sites listed in the document.

What we need from you

Create/confirm the vendor invoice entry for Northbridge Office Furnishings Inc.

Match to PO: MLHG-PO-104772 (terms Net 30).

Ensure taxes are applied per ship-to jurisdiction (ON vs QC) as outlined in the invoice package.

Route for approval under the following cost centres:

TOR-OPS-221

OTT-TRN-114

MTL-ADM-038

Notes / context

This is part of “Harborview Seating Refresh — Phase 2” and includes a mix of task chairs, conference chairs, stacking chairs, guest chairs, plus delivery and assembly services.

Deliveries are appointment-based and split across Toronto, Ottawa, and Montréal. Receiving teams are copied so they can coordinate dock scheduling if AP needs confirmation.

Potential duplicates
We previously received a preliminary quote (not an invoice) from the vendor in late December. This attached document is the invoice package we need processed now. Please flag if you see any duplication in the system.

If you need anything from my side (approval email, PO summary, or receiving confirmation), reply-all and I’ll jump on it.

Thanks,
Dana Kwan
Procurement Operations — Maple Leaf Healthcare Group (MLHG)
